page.title: 02North Moreton
page.content: {North Moreton} and South Moreton are two villages situated between the towns of Didcot and Wallingford. The village is quite small comprising many 15 and 16th century houses and is very popular with commuters who travel to London via Didcot Railway station and its fast 125 train service. The village has 'The Bear' Public house. North Moreton Manor is recorded in the original Domesday Book but only the outline of the moat remains today. 'All Saints' Church can have its origins traced back to Norman times and has been extended over the years. The tower has a peal of bells going back to 1591.
